1061830.name: RainLock
1061830.description:
ABOUT RAINLOCK

RainLock is a powerful customizable screen lock engine that allows you to easily create live screen lock theme containing videos, web pages, clock, cal, weather, text, images, etc. via the built-in WYSIWYG visual designer with minimal CPU and RAM usage. You are only limited by your imagination and creativity.

FEATURES

  • Build-in WYSIWYG visual designer makes it easy to create live screen lock theme with videos, web pages, clocks, weather etc.
  • Build-in Steam Workshop makes it easy to download and share live screen lock themes with just One-Click.
  • Clean UI, Easy to use and minimum CPU and RAM usage.
  • Support Multi-Monitors
  • Bring life to your lock screen with realtime graphics, videos, applications or websites.
  • Interactive live screen lock theme that can be controlled with your mouse and with click-on cool effects.
  • Support for all aspect ratios and native resolutions including 16:9, 21:9, 16:10, 4:3 etc.
1061830.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 俄语, 日语, 简体中文, 韩语
